weveBuilt.title: SEEYOUDOC
weveBuilt.description: We developed our very own online booking system for medical appointments.

content.title: We developed our very own online search and booking system for medical appointments
content.body: SeeYouDoc is Pragtech’s original product, aimed at addressing key healthcare issues in the country. With SeeYouDoc, we want to make a social impact.

content.title: The Philippines doesn’t have to fall behind in healthcare
content.body: We saw that healthcare services were being revolutionized all around the world except the Philippines. We started our approach by partnering with Marikina Valley Medical Society to understand the issues from the medical practitioners point-of-view. We realized that there's a lot of serious issues in the industry which will require a lot of time and development to solve. It's a challenge we accepted.

content.title: We seek to empower the people
content.body: Patients shouldn’t have to wait in line for hours, even days, with no assurance that a doctor would even arrive. Doctors should be able to organize their appointments and schedules even across multiple hospitals and facilities. With SeeYouDoc, we bring doctors and patients together.

content.title: “What we need is not just a technology solution, but a cultural change. We are a startup trying to provide a better healthcare experience.” - Noel del Castillo, CEO of Pragtechnologies and SeeYouDoc
content.body: Information about medical services should be readily accessible to all, and patients deserve to know all their options when it comes to healthcare. This is what SeeYouDoc stands for.

caseStudies.title: Take a look at what we build
caseStudies.subtitle: We have created original products and software, worked for international enterprises and government agencies alike. We let our work speak for us.

services.featuredAlt: A group of people in a meeting room looking at a computer screen
services.title: We have the skills and experience to serve you
services.subtitle: Curious about how we do things? In Pragtech, we create solutions and build impressive design. Our products are embedded with the most advanced technologies available in the market to build robust web and mobile applications your business deserves.

descriptionIcons.title: INTEGRITY
descriptionIcons.subtitle: We are candid and no-nonsense with our clients. We maintain transparency in all aspects of every project.

descriptionIcons.title: respect
descriptionIcons.subtitle: We build strong relationships founded in trust and respect. Here at Pragtech, we have fun but never forget to treat everyone with dignity.
